Author: Infi, Anna, Pox4eveR
Name: Glande Chat2
Description:
Glande Chat2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin with advanced Direct Message functionality.
It supports:

**Core Features:**
- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)

**Enhanced Emote Features:**
- BetterTTV + 7TV emote support
- Customizable emote sizes (0.5x to 3.0x scaling)
- Multiple streamer emote support
- 7TV personal emotes from any Twitch streamer
- Easy Twitch user ID lookup integration
- Emote conflict resolution (first-wins priority)
- Real-time emote size adjustment
- Global + personal emote loading

**Advanced Direct Message System (by Pox4eveR):**
- Dedicated DM tabs and windows for tell conversations
- Pop-out DM windows with native collapse/expand functionality
- DM Section window with integrated action buttons
- Smart message routing and history persistence
- Cross-world player support with accurate world detection
- Performance-optimized DM windows (7-13 FPS improvement)
- Intelligent focus management for main chat vs DM interfaces
- Custom DM color schemes and transparency settings
- Auto-open DM on new tells with configurable modes
- Friend integration with party invite and adventurer plate access
Punchline: Glande Chat2 - Enhanced chat with advanced Direct Message system and 7TV emotes
